activity_template.name: activity_body
activity_template.type: mediumtext COMMENT 'This is always rich text'

client_portal_group.name: permissions
client_portal_group.type: text COMMENT 'HVE::Client::Portal::Permission ids delimited by commas'

client_portal_invitation.name: firstname
client_portal_invitation.type: varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Invitee first name'

client_portal_invitation.name: email
client_portal_invitation.type: varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Email address of the invitee'

client_portal_invitation.name: affiliation_id
client_portal_invitation.type: int(11) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'The affiliation of the inviter'

contract_budget.name: time
contract_budget.type: int(11) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'sum of budget_items time'

resource_link.name: service
resource_link.type: varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'This is the service name

staff_bookmark.name: title
staff_bookmark.type: varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'DEPRECATED: Table now only supports bookmarking single objects (see get_object_bookmarks)'

staff_bookmark.name: owner_id
staff_bookmark.type: int(11) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'DEPRECATED: Table now only supports bookmarking single objects (see get_object_bookmarks)'
